ShortDescription.Value: This mod overrides the current seasons and allows use of custom weather values.

Publish.LongDescription:
Description: Installing this mod will result in seasons no longer progressing. Weather information like Temperature, Rain and Clouds can be adjusted in the options menu for this mod.
In the future I plan to add a button to enable/disable overriding these settings. I also plan to add a button to reset the settings to default values.
Credit to @Jacob on discord for the name idea of "Weather+"
WARNING: Seasons will no longer be functional when using this mod. Manual adjustments only.

ChangeLog.Value: Enabled enabled/disabled tick box's for indivdual settings
